scripts.start: npm run build:launcher && npm run start:agent
scripts.start:playground: npm run build:happ && concurrently "npm run start:agent:playground"
scripts.network: npm run build:happ && concurrently-repeat "npm run start:agent"
scripts.network:playground: npm run build:happ && concurrently-repeat "npm run start:agent:playground"
scripts.start:agent: cross-env HC_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run dev:libs" "npm run start:happ" "sleep 20 && npm run start -w how-app"
scripts.start-proxied: npm run build:happ && npm run build -w @how/elements && cross-env HC_PORT=$(port) concurrently -k "npm run start:happ-proxied" "npm run start -w how-app"
scripts.start-rerun: cross-env HC_PORT=8888 concurrently -k "npm run build:watch -w @how/elements" "echo "pass" | hc s --piped run 0 -p 8888" "npm run start -w how-app"
scripts.prepare: npm run build -w @how/elements && npm run build -w how-app
scripts.test: npm run build:happ && npm run build -w @how/elements && npm t -w tests
scripts.start:happ: rimraf .hc* && RUST_LOG=warn echo "pass" | hc s --piped generate ./apps/launcher/workdir/how.happ --run=$HC_PORT -a how network mdns
scripts.start:happ-proxied: rimraf .hc* && RUST_LOG=debug echo "pass" | hc s --piped generate ./launcher/workdir/how.happ --run=$HC_PORT -a how network --bootstrap https://bootstrap-staging.holo.host/ quic -p=kitsune-proxy://SYVd4CF3BdJ4DS7KwLLgeU3_DbHoZ34Y-qroZ79DOs8/kitsune-quic/h/165.22.32.11/p/5779/--
scripts.package:launcher: npm run build:launcher && npm run package -w how-app && hc web-app pack ./apps/launcher/workdir
scripts.build:launcher: npm run build -w "@how/elements" && npm run build -w how-app
scripts.clean: npm run clean:node && npm run clean:rust
scripts.clean:node: rimraf node_modules && rimraf ui/apps/how/node_modules/  && rimraf ui/lib/node_modules && rimraf test/node_modules
